newsitem.title: LATVIA: STRENCI, LODE RISE IN EARLY SHARE TRADE.
newsitem.headline: STRENCI, LODE RISE IN EARLY SHARE TRADE.

text.p: Secondary market shares Strenci Forestry and Lode Brick saw good gains at the morning price setting session on Wednesday, benefiting from recent positive corporate news.
Strenci rose to 1.51 lats from 1.32 lats with 32,362 shares available for purchase. It yesterday announced a 1996 profit of 124,180 lats.
Lode Brick rose to 2.87 lats from 2.50 lats after it last week said that last week it would make a bonus share issue.
Other companies were stable. Unibanka on the official list was unchanged at 4.70 lats while Riga Transport Fleet rose slightly to 1.66 lats from 1.63 lats.
The rest of the market was calm, mirroring a more subdued mood on the Latvian bourse this week.
